mapper.sql: id, dev_id, name, code, caliber, material, geom, tpl_type_id, data_info, delete_flag, create_by, create_at, update_by, update_at
mapper.select: select id, dev_id, name, code, caliber, material, st_astext(geom) geom, tpl_type_id, data_info, delete_flag, create_by, create_at, update_by, update_at from gis_dev_ext where dev_id = #{devId,jdbcType=BIGINT} limit 1

select id, dev_id, tpl_type_id,data_info from gis_dev_ext
delete_flag = FALSE
and dev_id in
#{item}
select sum(cast(data_info::jsonb->> #{val} as FLOAT)) totalLength from gis_dev_ext where caliber is not null

SELECT t4.*, t5.name AS type_name, t5.p_id FROM ( SELECT id, dev_id, type_id , ST_AsText(st_transform(geom, 4326)) AS geom FROM ( SELECT t3.type_id, t2.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM gis_dev_ext t1 WHERE delete_flag = false AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ( SELECT regexp_split_to_table(#{devIds}, ',') AS dev_id ) vir WHERE CAST(vir.dev_id AS BIGINT) = t1.dev_id ) ) t2 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT id, type_id FROM share_dev ) t3 ON t2.dev_id = t3.id ) rs ) t4 LEFT JOIN share_dev_type t5 ON t4.type_id = t5.id

select dev_id,GeometryType(geom) as type,ST_AsText(st_transform(geom, 4326)) AS geom from gis_dev_ext where data_info->>'dlm' like '%${val}%' or data_info->>'code' like '%${val}%' or data_info->>'address' like '%${val}%' AND delete_flag = false
select dev_id,GeometryType(geom) as type,ST_AsText(st_transform(geom, 4326)) AS geom from gis_dev_ext where dev_id in (${devIds}) AND delete_flag = false
select dev_id,code,name,st_x(ST_Transform((geom),4326)) as x,st_y(st_astext(ST_Transform((geom),4326))) as y,belong_to from public.gis_dev_ext WHERE caliber is null AND delete_flag = false
select dev_id,code,caliber,material,belong_to,data_info from public.gis_dev_ext WHERE caliber is not null AND delete_flag = false
